section.name: Unit 1: Meeting Language Needs: Increasing Rigor for ELA
section.summary:
This unit focuses on the rationale for increasing the rigor of adult English Language Acquisition instruction in order to

  • meet the increasingly complex language demands adult English language learners (ELLs) face in today’s world
  • help adult ELLs thrive and transition to new opportunities in their lives in any type of class at any level.

The content in this unit complements the content in Units 3 and 4, as well as in other modules in the LINCS ESL Pro Project.  Remember that participants who complete the required unit activities will be able to print out a personalized certificate of participation at the end of the unit. For this unit, the requirements for a certificate of participation are completion of:

  • The pre- and post-unit surveys
  • The two reflections on readings
  • Components of Rigorous Language Instruction activity
  • Reflection on Learner Vignettes

There are additional materials within the units that provide for deeper learning opportunities.  These optional deeper learning opportunities will take time beyond the estimated 2-3 hours for completion.
